location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant William Bruce, Resident, Bushire, to Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter regards William Bruce's communications with Soud bin Abdil Azees [Imam Saud al kabeer bin Abdul-Aziz bin Muhammad bin Saud], Chief of the Wahabees [Wahabis]. Bruce acknowledges the receipt of a copy of a letter, dated 18 February 1814, from the Secretary to the Supreme Government, which supersedes an earlier order for Bruce to negotiate a treaty with the Chieftain.
